alert.note: Alert for Allen; Cass; De Kalb; Elkhart; Fulton; Huntington; Lagrange; Marshall; Miami; Noble; Northern Kosciusko; Southern Kosciusko; Steuben; Wabash; Whitley (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 11:23PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...Strong winds associated with an area of showers and isolated thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Elkhart, Wabash, Noble, Whitley, northwestern Huntington, Kosciusko, northern Cass, Lagrange, Steuben, northwestern Allen, western De Kalb, central Fulton, northwestern Miami, southeastern Marshall, eastern St. Joseph, Branch and western Hillsdale Counties through 1230 AM EDT... At 1121 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking these showers and isolated thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles north of Colon to near Royal Center. Movement was east at 30 mph. Numerous wind gusts between 40 and 45 mph have been observed with this activity. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Colon around 1125 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Union City, Mexico, Peru, Wabash, Litchfield, Jonesville and Andrews. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 324 and 357. Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 21. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 108 and 156. Interstate 80 in Ohio near mile marker 0. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.

area.areaDesc: Allen; Cass; De Kalb; Elkhart; Fulton; Huntington; Lagrange; Marshall; Miami; Noble; Northern Kosciusko; Southern Kosciusko; Steuben; Wabash; Whitley
